name: Tiny Jukebox (itch)
description:
Leonie, a tiny jukebox who can only play 10 seconds songs, forgot how to play her songs. Help her by playing the notes in time! 
Try to complete the 24 songs without losing life in this rythm game 🙃

Controls
- Arrows / X,C,V,B keys : play note

Original Soundtrack :
Soundtrack is available for free here :  https://grizzlygames.bandcamp.com/album/tiny-jukebox

Credits :
- Boris Warembourg : GD, LD, dev, music, sounds, pixel art.
Made for Ludum Dare 51 (JAM)
